info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 02 at 3:07PM CST until January 03 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 22 expected. * WHERE...In Louisiana, Rapides and Vernon Parishes. In Texas, Northern Newton, Tyler and Northern Jasper Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
